description: Guhanuka nabyo ni kimwe mu mpamvu zikunze kwibasira abana bato.
title: Guhanuka nabyo ni kimwe mu mpamvu zikunze kwibasira abana bato.
content:
Guhanuka nabyo ni kimwe mu mpamvu zikunze kwibasira abana bato. Niyo mpavu, amabaraza, esikariye, ibisenge, amadirishya aho bakinira n’aho baryama bigomba kuba bite ibibirinze, hakoreshejwe inkuta 
mu rwego rwo kubar-inda kugwa.
